sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import CharOptions from './CharOptions' class CharStatus extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.updateStatus = this.updateStatus.bind(this); this.state = { str: "", con: "", pow: "", dex: "", app: "", siz: "", int: "", edu: "", hp: "", mp: "", san: "", idea: "", luck: "", knowledge: "", o_str: 0, o_con: 0, o_pow: 0, o_dex: 0, o_app: 0, o_siz: 0, o_int: 0, o_edu: 0, o_hp: 0, o_mp: 0, o_san: 0, o_idea: 0, o_luck: 0, o_knowledge: "", t_str: "", t_con: "", t_pow: "", t_dex: "", t_app: "", t_siz: "", t_int: "", t_edu: "", t_hp: "", t_mp: "", t_san: "", t_idea: "", t_luck: "", t_knowledge: "", f_str: "", f_con: "", f_pow: "", f_dex: "", f_app: "", f_siz: "", f_int: "", f_edu: "", f_hp: "", f_mp: "", f_san: "", f_idea: "", f_luck: "", f_knowledge: "" } } getStatus = (n, m, l) => { let sum = 0; for (let i = 1; i <= n; i++) { sum += Math.floor(Math.random() * m) + 1; } sum += l; return sum; } getAllStatus = () => { this.setState({ str: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), con: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), pow: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), dex: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), app: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), siz: this.getStatus(2, 6, 6), int: this.getStatus(2, 6, 6), edu: this.getStatus(3, 6, 3), }, () => { this.updateCalculatedStatus(); }) } updateFinalStatus = () => { this.setState({ f_str: this.state.str + this.state.o_str, f_con: this.state.con + this.state.o_con, f_pow: this.state.pow + this.state.o_pow, f_dex: this.state.dex + this.state.o_dex, f_app: this.state.app + this.state.o_app, f_siz: this.state.siz + this.state.o_siz, f_int: this.state.int + this.state.o_int, f_edu: this.state.edu, f_hp: this.state.hp, f_mp: this.state.mp, f_san: this.state.san, f_idea: this.state.idea, f_luck: this.state.luck, f_knowledge: this.state.knowledge }) } updateCalculatedStatus = () => { this.setState({ hp: Math.ceil((parseInt(this.state.con)+parseInt(this.state.siz))/2), mp: this.state.pow, san: this.state.pow*5, idea: this.state.int*5, luck: this.state.pow*5, knowledge: this.state.edu*5 }, () => { this.updateFinalStatus(); }) } updateOtherStatus = (e) => { const statusName = e.target.id.slice(2); this.setState({ [e.target.id]: parseInt(e.target.value) || 0 }, () => { this.updateCalculatedStatus(); }) } updateTemporaryStatus = (e) => { const otherStatusName = e.target.id; const statusName = e.target.id.slice(2); const finalStatusName = "f_" + statusName this.setState({ [e.target.id]: parseInt(e.target.value) || 0 }, () => { this.updateCalculatedStatus(); }) } updateStatus = (statusName, statusValue) => { this.setState({ [statusName]: statusValue }, () => { this.updateCalculatedStatus(); }) } render(){ return(
STR CON POW DEX APP SIZ INT EDU HP MP 初期SAN アイデア 幸運 知識
能力値
その他増加分
一時的増加
合計値
) } } export default CharStatus;
